name: Marchine
description:
Play as Phish Fischer, a humble fisherman, as he tries to save his broken ship from sinking. Obtain upgrades from your MARCHINE to increase efficiency, but will it matter in the end?

INSTRUCTION

  • Gather water from the holes in the wall of your ship, or from the overflowing water coming in from the bottom, and drop it into the top of your MARCHINE.
  • Buy upgrades and try to hold out for as long as you can! (Upgrade menu pauses the game.)

CONTROLS

 - Arrow Keys to Move - Z to Confirm
 - X to Cancel
 - SHIFT to Sprint
 - F5 for Fullscreen
 - F6 for Window Size
